feed.title: Ente Auth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Auth] Passkey fix for linux by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2154
  • Added coindcx icon by @nikunjkumarnakum in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2148
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2185
  • [auth] Sync on app resume by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.12...auth-v3.0.13

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.0.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FEAT] Auth goodies for linux by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2255
  • Warning about icon sizes and instructions on matching the icon to the issuer. by @vbenincasa in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2240
  • [FIX] Bundle Metainfo and Bump version by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2256
  • [FIX(auth)] Run pacman build on beta, fix deps by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2257
  • [auth] Update logs by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2258
  • FIX(auth) also move the pacman build to artifacts by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2259
  • [auth] Fix keyboard pop up when autofocus is turned on by @klaas0 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2232
  • [auth] Optimize and reduce filesize by @vbenincasa in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2229, https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2228, https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2227,https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2244,https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2243
  • Maximize icon compatibility by @vbenincasa in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2226,https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2242
  • [auth] Add new and updates custom icons in auth by @ialexanderbrito in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2157
  • [auth] Show contact support option on error by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2238
  • Bump version by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2239
  • [auth] Potential fix for invalid handshake error on Windows by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2247
  • [auth] Lint fix by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2248

New Contributors

  • @klaas0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.13...auth-v3.0.17

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2279
  • [auth][windows] Update letsencrypt root cert by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2285
  • [auth] Icons for Yahoo, OKX, 1XBET, Bitget, & Crypto.com by @Vantesh in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2291
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2340
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2393
  • [Auth] Add icons for Deriv & Airtm by @Vantesh in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2411
  • [auth] Fix json by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2423
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2455
  • [auth] Add new icons by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2452
  • fix(auth/import): remove cross button from import page by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2469
  • fix(auth/connectivity): try to fix certificate issue on windows 11 by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2472
  • fix(auth/code): add option to view raw codes in case of parse fail by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2474
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2508
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2568
  • [mob][auth] Lockscreen option auth by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2465
  • [mob][auth] Bump up to v3.1.0 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2582
  • [Auth] Add new icons and fix some icons by @Vantesh in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2559
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2618
  • [Auth] Add 3 new icons by @shmshd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2627
  • Change Auth mobile apps' names to "Ente Auth" by @dnred in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2622
  • [auth] redirect support issues to github discussion by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2605
  • Added & Improved Logos by @vktr2b in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2642
  • Custom icons for auth by @ludespeedny in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2646
  • Add Shakepay and Newton Crypto icons by @httpjamesm in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2634
  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2660
  • [auth] allow without backups use for windows by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2650

New Contributors

  • @Vantesh made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2291
  • @dnred made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2449
  • @shmshd made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2627
  • @vktr2b made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2642

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.0.17...auth-v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] don't use privacy screen for desktop by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2680

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.1.0...auth-v3.1.1

entry.title: New release for Ente Auth: auth-v3.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [auth] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2746
  • [mob][auth] local_auth upgrade & work around for new applock key by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2752
  • [mob][auth] Option to add pin/passcode without having a system lock by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2738
  • [mob][auth] Update flutter submodule to use v3.24.0 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2778
  • [mob][auth] Change dialog copy by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2796

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/auth-v3.1.2-beta...auth-v3.1.3
